From: Anderson, Bob [mailto:BAnderson@sara.com] Sent: Wednesday, November 28, 2012 11:20 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: New MBO Contact Thank you, Sara. I am on travel at a conference all this week, but I’ll try to call you as soon as I get a chance..!! Look forward to chatting..!! Regards, Bob A. Cell: 949-677-5805 From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Wednesday, November 28, 2012 9:29 AM To: Anderson, Bob Subject: New MBO Contact Hi Bob, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Sarah Buckely. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Sarah has brought me up to speed on your background and I would like to set up a time to chat. You can schdule via my online calendar by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVBXsUJk%2BPOXArrsjTSOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to working with you!
